name: cucumber-ts-testcafe
description: Starter project to write and debug cucumber-js features in TypeScript and testcafe

scripts.cucumber: node ./node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js src/features/**/*.feature --no-color --foo=bar --logLevel=error --require src/support/world.ts --require src/support/testControllerHolder.ts --require src/step_definitions/**/*.ts --require src/support/hooks.ts  --require-module ts-node/register --format-options "{\"snippetInterface\": \"async-await\"}" --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json --format summary --format progress-bar --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty

author: saravanan
